items.sentence: Tom, put your money away. I\'m paying this time.
The Shinano River is the longest river in Japan.
The agenda for the meeting has been distributed.
The bad weather prevented me from going to work.
The bus will take you to the center of the city.
Let\'s not forget that Tom used to be in prison.
Mary is not my girlfriend. She\'s just a friend.
Walking to work in this heat isn\'t a good idea.
Don\'t you think that\'s a little too expensive?
I\'ll let you know the results as soon as I can.
